metadata.title: DRUMSTICK Minis Simply Dipped Vanilla Frozen Dessert Cones

images.alt: drumstick chockolate fudge brownie king cones

text: DRUMSTICK Minis Simply Dipped Vanilla Frozen Dessert Cones

The creamy, crunchy, classic Vanilla DRUMSTICK now comes in a mini-sized treat. NESTLÉ DRUMSTICK Minis Simply Dipped Vanilla Frozen Dessert Cones (6 x 63 ml) feature the same creamy vanilla covered with a rich chocolatey coating in a smaller size. Made with dairy from Canadian cows, this 6-Pack is sure to excite your buds and tastebuds alike. Raise your cone to DRUMSTICK goodness!
NESTLÉ DRUMSTICK Minis Simply Dipped Vanilla Frozen Dessert Cones (6 x 63 ml) may be smaller in size but are just as big on taste!
Creamy and tasty, our dairy comes from Canadian cows. We are proud to support the Canadian dairy industry!

Modified Milk Ingredients, Chocolatey Coating (Coconut, Soybean and Palm Oils, Sugar, Cocoa, Modified Milk Ingredients, Modified Palm Oil, Unsweetened Chocolate, Soy Lecithin, Natural Flavour), Sugars (Sugar, Glucose), Wheat Flour, Milk Ingredients, Coconut, Palm and Soybean Oils, Mono- and Diglycerides, Soy Lecithin, Salt, Propylene Glycol Monostearate, Cellulose Gum, Carob Bean Gum, Carrageenan, Annatto, Natural Flavour.
